sub_title: Coordinator ASML Internship Office | ASML (digital) Ambassador | Being part of progress @ASML
summary:
I am a highly motivated and enthusiastic professional with experience in several domains.
- Internships
- HR
- Recruitment
- Mentoring
- Training
- Finance
- Travel

profile_positions.description:
The ASML Students Office is part of the HR Talent Programs department.
Within ASML we host 200 interns and graduation students a year, next to 50 scholarship students and a number of other student programs. These are mostly students with a technical background. Our Student programs, like internships, are an important way to get in contact with talented students, which makes it even more important to manage these programs in a successful way. The ASML Students Office coordinates this group as part of the HR&O resource center.
I am responsible for the ASML Internship Office as a mentor.
We offer challenging assignments on lower Vocational, Bachelor and Master level and our goal is to attract the best students who can be future employees of ASML.
We are also the first contact for interns and their mentors and facilitate the evaluation process.
The ASML Internship Office also organizes events for our interns, where they can develop their personal and social skills.
profile_positions.title: Coordinator ASML Talent Programs and Recruiter for Internships

profile_positions.description:
Provide day-to-day support for ASML Resource Center and Recruiters. 
Assist the Recruiters with recruitment (through agencies, internet and career events) of qualified staff. Main tasks are:
•	Assistant to the HR&O Resource Center Manager 
•	Arranging interviews
•	Calendar management
•	Support Recruiters with selection from the applications received and coordinate the way they are processed
•	Posting advertisements and vacancies on job boards
•	Maintain contact with external agencies
•	Responsible for the Referral Program
•	Representing ASML at career fairs, open days, etc.
•	Sustain candidate database with agreed criteria
•	If necessary take up contact with applicants to obtain additional information, and/or invite them for an interview
profile_positions.title: HR&O Assistant Recruiter

profile_positions.description:
• First contact/ambassador for ASML wrt candidates and agencies.
• Calendar Management for HR&O Resource Center Department.
• Responsible for the Referral Program.
• Input data in Recruitment Database (Talentlink).
• Several administrative tasks (phone and e-mail).
profile_positions.title: HR&O Recruitment Representative

profile_positions.description:
• Coordinate and plan interviews between applicants, departments and hiring managers.
• Calendar Management.
• First contact/ambassador for ASML wrt candidates.
• Input data in Recruitment Database (Talentlink).
• Several administrative tasks (phone and e-mail).
profile_positions.title: HR&O Recruitment Back Office Planner

profile_positions.description:
•           Takes care of accurate processing and controlling mutations in the personnel-administration.
•          Process and maintain HR/Pay data in SAP, staff reorganizations, run and audit monthly reports.  
•           Supports the duties of HR workers by keeping the agenda, taking care of post and telephone-calls and working out correspondence and reports.
•           Coordinates the assessment-process by providing information, processing, map and archiving data.
•           Maps surveys with regard to personnel- and HR data to provide the management with the necessary control and controlling-information.
•           Executes supporting activities with regard to the organization.
•           Contribution to improvements in process, procedure at function by generation new ideas and solutions.
profile_positions.title: HR&O Representative

profile_positions.description:
As a Travel Office Financial Representative I was responsible for all travel and expense claims within ASML and acted as contact person for employees and management based on my expert knowledge of the ASML Travel Policy content and processes. I had interaction with various internal departments (e.g. Finance, Tax, Treasury and HR&O) and external parties (e.g. salary agency and several credit card companies).
Provide ASML travelers travel advances, credit card and cash for their travel.
Responsible for the visa applications for all ASML travelers.
profile_positions.title: Travel Office Financial Representative

profile_positions.description:
• Sourcing products, itineraries and destinations to meet customer demands for bespoke travel.
• Dealing with customer enquiries and aiming to meet their expectations regarding hotels, itineraries, flights and other means of transport.
• Provide internal customers fair amounts of travel advances.
• Responsible for the financial handling of the travel allowances.
• Overseeing the smooth, efficient running of the business.
• Visa applications
• Booking flights online in Galileo
profile_positions.title: Travel Office Representative
